Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry

Class AttackModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.AttackModule
  • public class AttackModule
extends java.lang.Object
    An AttackModule is an atomic event composing the workflow of a Weapon's AttackPattern.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private AttackPattern context
      The AttackPattern the AttackModule is played within.
      private java.lang.String description
      A string containing useful information on what the module can or cannot do.
      private java.util.List<Effect> effects
      The consequences of the module, often influenced by the choices made by the user when acquiring the list of targets
      private int id
      The id of the AttackModule inside the AttackPattern it belongs to.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the module.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> next
      A list containing all the ids of other AttackModules that can be played immediately after the current one.
      private AmmoCubes summonCost
      The cost of activating the module.
      private java.util.List<Target> targets
      A list of choices the user has to make in order to activate the effects.
      private boolean used
      Whether or not the AttackModule has already been used within the same attack.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      private AttackModule​(int id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, AmmoCubes summonCost, java.util.List<Target> targets, java.util.List<Effect> effects, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> next)
      This is the only constructor.
